title: Wordle Clone
description: Recreation of the popular game Wordle. In this project I learned to utilize localstorage for storing wins and losses for returning users. The localstorage also stores which theme the user set so its the same when they come back. I then learned to use eventListeners for key inputs to allow users to use keyboard strokes instead of clicking on the keyboard.

title: TFT-Forge
description: TFT-Forge is made to be a social platform for users playing the game Team Fight Tactics. It allows users to find optimal builds and find current metas.
